FuncDef: This command specifies which Dot1Q tag position Dot1P bits in a QinQ encapsulated packet should be used to evaluate Dot1P QoS classification.

ParaDef.Info: The top parameter is mutually exclusive to the bottom parameter. When the top parameter is specified, the top most PBits are used (if existing) to match any dot1p dot1p-value entries. Table 17 defines the dot1p evaluation behavior when the top parameter is specified.

The bottom parameter and the top parameter are mutually exclusive. When the bottom parameter is specified, the bottom most PBits are used (if existing) to match any dot1p dot1p-value entries. Table 18 defines the dot1p evaluation behavior when the bottom parameter is specified.

ExtraInfo: Default: no match-qinq-dot1p (no filtering based on p-bits) (top or bottom must be specified to override the default QinQ dot1p behavior)
